action.action-desc: Mr. Calvert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to increase the maximum penalty for mail theft.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring the Safety of Our Mail Act of 2025.

section.header: Increasing the maximum penalty for mail theft
section.text: Section 1708 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking not more than five years and inserting not more than 10 years.
